meanings.definition: The art or craft of decorating objects with paper cut-outs.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to create beautiful decoupages in her art class.
meanings.sent2: The decoupages on the table added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The decoupages she made for her friend's birthday were a big hit!
meanings.sent4: Her room was a gallery of decoupages, each telling a different story.
meanings.sent5: The intricate decoupages seemed to come to life on the walls.

meanings.sent1: She carefully decoupages the gift box for her sister's present.
meanings.sent2: He decoupages his scrapbook with memories from his travels.
meanings.sent3: The kids decided to decoupages their school project with colorful paper.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity shines through when she decoupages various items in her room.
meanings.sent5: The artist decoupages the canvas, transforming it into a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Decorative work involving cutting out pictures and applying them to surfaces.
meanings.sent1: The decoupages on the vase were meticulously done.
meanings.sent2: She admired the decoupages on the mirror in the antique shop.
meanings.sent3: The decoupages on the lampshade added a whimsical touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of decoupages showcased her talent and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The decoupages on the furniture brought a pop of color to the room.
